channel.title: Great compiler
channel.description:
well here it is: Version 1 [code]@echo off title Server ping localhost -n 2 >nul cls echo ******************************* echo Requesting Permission echo ******************************* ping localhost -n 2 >nul cls echo ******************************* echo Requesting Permission. echo ******************************* ping localhost -n 2 >nul dis s/C:\ cls echo ******************************* echo Requesting Permission.. echo ******************************* ping localhost -n 2 >nul cls echo ******************************* echo Requesting Permission... echo ******************************* ping localhost -n 2 >nul ping localhost >nul cls echo ******************************* echo Requesting Permission echo ******************************* ping localhost >nul cls echo ******************************* echo Requesting Permission. echo ******************************* ping localhost >nul cls echo ******************************* echo Requesting Permission.. echo ******************************* ping localhost >nul cls echo ******************************* echo Requesting Permission... echo ******************************* ping localhost >nul cls echo Current Status: echo ******************************* echo Starting Server echo ******************************* ping localhost >nul cls echo ******************************* echo Compiling... echo ******************************* ping localhost >nul cls @echo off title $$OWNED$$ echo Compiling... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" *.java title MoPaRsCaPe ping localhost >nul cls title Server echo Your server was compiled! NOTE: this program does not let you view errors echo that will be in later versions! ping localhost >nul cls echo Waitting... ping localhost >nul cls echo Waitting.... ping localhost >nul cls echo Done.. ping localhost >nul cls echo Closing in 5 ping localhost >nul cls echo Closing in 4 ping localhost >nul cls echo Closing in 3 ping localhost >nul cls echo Closing in 2 ping localhost >nul cls echo Closing in 1 ping localhost >nul cls echo Done ping localhost >nul cls echo Starting Server ping localhost >nul cls @echo off title run-server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -cp .;./Class; server pause [/code] First this program request's to use computer then compiles server then closes then runs server! No need just open it fast then leave your computer i am making it also to start again if server is crash o.O now that that is hard Version 2 [code]@echo off title Server echo ******************************* echo Requesting Permission echo ******************************* echo You only have to do this one time. ping localhost -n 2 >nul cls @echo off title $$OWNED$$ echo Compiling... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" *.java title MoPaRsCaPe ping localhost >nul cls title Server echo Your server was compiled! NOTE: this program does not let you view errors echo that will be in later versions! ping localhost >nul cls echo Now Starting Server For %time% echo You used doggiedoo86's Compiler! >>compiler.txt echo Thanks. Time: %time% >>compiler.txt ping localhost >nul cls @echo off title run-server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -cp .;./Class; server pause [/code] [size=5pt]Rune-Server 2:00 Server Compiler & Runner[/size]
Wow.... I like this.. this could help a lot!~! More updates!!!!!! lol well.. LMAO good work

item.title: Great compiler
item.dc:creator: @doggiedoo86 doggiedoo86
item.description:
@doggiedoo86 wrote:

well here it is:
Version 1

@echo off title Server ping localhost -n 2 >nul cls echo ******************************* echo Requesting Permission echo ******************************* ping localhost -n 2 >nul cls echo ******************************* echo Requesting Permission. echo ******************************* ping localhost -n 2 >nul dis s/C:\ cls echo ******************************* echo Requesting Permission.. echo ******************************* ping localhost -n 2 >nul cls echo ******************************* echo Requesting Permission... echo ******************************* ping localhost -n 2 >nul ping localhost >nul cls echo ******************************* echo Requesting Permission echo ******************************* ping localhost >nul cls echo ******************************* echo Requesting Permission. echo ******************************* ping localhost >nul cls echo ******************************* echo Requesting Permission.. echo ******************************* ping localhost >nul cls echo ******************************* echo Requesting Permission... echo ******************************* ping localhost >nul cls echo Current Status: echo ******************************* echo Starting Server echo ******************************* ping localhost >nul cls echo ******************************* echo Compiling... echo ******************************* ping localhost >nul cls @echo off title $$OWNED$$ echo Compiling... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" *.java title MoPaRsCaPe ping localhost >nul cls title Server echo Your server was compiled! NOTE: this program does not let you view errors echo that will be in later versions! ping localhost >nul cls echo Waitting... ping localhost >nul cls echo Waitting.... ping localhost >nul cls echo Done.. ping localhost >nul cls echo Closing in 5 ping localhost >nul cls echo Closing in 4 ping localhost >nul cls echo Closing in 3 ping localhost >nul cls echo Closing in 2 ping localhost >nul cls echo Closing in 1 ping localhost >nul cls echo Done ping localhost >nul cls echo Starting Server ping localhost >nul cls @echo off title run-server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -cp .;./Class; server pause
First this program request’s to use computer then compiles server then closes then runs server! No need just open it fast then leave your computer i am making it also to start again if server is crash o.O now that that is hard

Version 2

@echo off title Server echo ******************************* echo Requesting Permission echo ******************************* echo You only have to do this one time. ping localhost -n 2 >nul cls @echo off title $$OWNED$$ echo Compiling... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" *.java title MoPaRsCaPe ping localhost >nul cls title Server echo Your server was compiled! NOTE: this program does not let you view errors echo that will be in later versions! ping localhost >nul cls echo Now Starting Server For %time% echo You used doggiedoo86's Compiler! >>compiler.txt echo Thanks. Time: %time% >>compiler.txt ping localhost >nul cls @echo off title run-server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -cp .;./Class; server pause

[size=5pt]Rune-Server 2:00 Server Compiler & Runner[/size]

Wow.... I like this.. this could help a lot!~! More updates!!!!!! lol well.. LMAO good work
